welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kapakli, Turkey! Immerse yourself in the city's charming atmosphere, known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kapakli has to offer.

restaurants.name: Rumeli Meyhanesi
restaurants.description: Rumeli Meyhanesi is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.description: CİĞERCİ RAMAZAN is a kebab restaurant located in Tekirdağ.
